nodes.text: The Gungan Sacred Place, also known simply as the Sacred Place, was an ancient monument built by the Elders of Naboo north of the Lianorm Swamp. It became sacred to the Gungans, a sanctuary for troubled times. During the Trade Federation's invasion of Naboo, Queen Padmé Amidala was guided there by Jar Jar Binks to meet Boss Nass, and together they formulated a plan to retake their homeworld. After the Battle of Naboo, the Gungans took their fallen warriors to the sacred place. They invited Amidala to attend the funeral, though as there was no time the queen sent Eirtaé and Yané in her place.
